## Bio

Yesenia (Yesi) Garcia is a third-year PhD student in the Department of Mental Health at the Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health. Her research broadly focuses on the prevention and treatment of mental health in families living in under-resourced communities globally. She utilizes mixed methods in her research, with a strong interest in measurement, program development, and program evaluation, to enhance the effectiveness of mental health interventions.
